text: unkalukku vanattiliruntum, pumiyiliruntum unavalippavan yar? (Unkal) cevippulan mitum, (unkal) parvaikalin mitum caktiyutaiyavan yar? Irantavarriliruntu uyirullavarraiyum, uyirullavarriliruntu irantavarraiyum velippatuttupavan yar? (Akilankalin amaittuk) kariyankalaiyum tittamittuc ceyalpatuttupavan yar?" Enru(napiye!) Nir kelum. Utane avarkal"allah" ena patilalipparkal; "avvarayin avanitam ninkal payapaktiyutan irukka ventama?" Enru nir ketpiraka
